name: Slime Climb (JamesLango)
description:
Click and drag to fling your character around. Try and make it to the end of the level.

Hitting a surface will stick you to that surface!

Made for Weekly Game Jam 164 theme "Hurl".

Art by Jukes
Music and Music Implementation by Michael Fewkes
SFX and SFX Implementation by Sam
Gameplay programming and design by James Langford
